ETHNCMAJ_W32.question_text: According to the U.S. Census Bureau, in the next 25 to 30 years, African Americans, Latinos, and people of Asian descent will make up a majority of the population. In general, do you think that this is

MC_options: The growing number of newcomers from other countries threatens traditional American customs and values
The growing number of newcomers from other countries strengthens American society

Society is just as well off if people have priorities other than marriage and children

The economic system in this country is generally fair to most Americans
ECONFAIR2_W32.question_text: Which statement comes closer to your own views?
